casebody.data:
Mark AMBROSE
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided February 1, 2017 Richard H. Stannard III, assigned counsel, in support of the petition. James M. Ralls, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Mark Ambrose's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 169 Conn. App. 844 , 153 A.3d 49 (2016), is denied.
